segments.text: You're here to make a deposit , is that correct ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . I'd like to deposit 2,000 RIB into my Current Account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Could I have the cash and your Bank Book , please ? Oh dear ... there seems to be some problems here ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry but 5 of these notes seem to be counterfeit . Look at this watermark , do you see it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It does look a little strange , I didn't notice that before .
segments.speaker: S2
